# File lib/solr/connection.rb, line 140
  def post(request)
    response = @connection.post(@url.path + "/" + request.handler,
                                request.to_s,
                                { "Content-Type" => request.content_type })
  
    case response
    when Net::HTTPSuccess then response.body
    else
      response.error!
    end
  
  end
